text: @PressSec @realDonaldTrump Relative to countries that DIDN’T botch their response and sit on their tiny orange hands for 6 weeks, our fed response to #COVID19 has been an abject disaster, when does the right wing Trump apparatus finally come to terms with that? 40, 50, 60k deaths? #UCantGaslightAPandemic https://t.co/9YC5ux94sK
